attributes.action: RECONSIDER & CONSULT THE PUBLIC ABOUT THE INTRODUCTION OF EMERGENCY CARE ASSISTANTS ON A&E AMBULANCES.AMBULANCES SHOULD ONLY BE STAFFED BY PROPERLY TRAINED PARAMEDICS & TECHNICIANS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment is restructuring the Ambulance Service without consulting the
public or the operational staff.These changes will result in
A&E  Ambulances losing a qualified and trained member of staff.

These will be replaced by a driver trained to drive under
emergency conditions,and with basic first aid skills.

(ECA-read as Community Support Officer,EMT-read as Police Constable)

It is being rushed through, with little thought being given to training or the future. 

At present, every Ambulance,(except for
trial areas), is staffed by a minimum of 2 Emergency Medical Technicians.
**(There is supposed to be a Paramedic on each ,this will soon be a minimum of 2 ECAs,but only in exceptional circumstances. Excepetional circumstances means when we run out of Paramedic crews to send.
This is everyday**
It will not mean more ambulances are available.

Paramedics will burn out very quickly,and recruitment/retention will suffer rapidly.

And people will die...

As a Paramedic you cannot do your job properly without a properly trained colleague.
Please think about what you are doing to our Emergency
Services, this will be a massive step backwards.
